attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure when government compensation to individuals is announced it is announced in terms of the number of standard rate taxpayers that equates to, as well as the monetary value.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people need to know just how many of them may as well not have paid their income tax when it was destined only to be handed out in compensation by the government, on their behalf, because some KNOWN member of the establishment committed a criminal offence against the person being compensated.
